LightningComponentBundle.description: Auto-rotating banner carousel component for featured content and promotions with manual navigation and accessibility support

property.name: autoRotate
property.label: Auto Rotate
property.description: Enable or disable auto-rotation of slides

property.name: pauseOnHover
property.label: Pause on Hover
property.description: Pause auto-rotation when user hovers over the carousel

property.name: showNavigationArrows
property.label: Show Navigation Arrows
property.description: Display previous and next navigation arrow buttons

property.name: showIndicators
property.label: Show Slide Indicators
property.description: Display slide indicator dots for direct navigation

property.name: showPlayPauseControl
property.label: Show Play/Pause Control
property.description: Display play/pause button for manual control of auto-rotation
